tuv.seg: Occupational pensions are organised by employers to provide pensions to one or more employees on retirement
Tá cur síos deanta sa cháipéis seo ar na rialacha a bhaineann le iarratas a dhéanamh ar Phinsin Cheirde
There are rules that apply to personal pensions. Information on personal pensions for self-employed people or employed people who do not have an occupational pension
Déanann an cháipéis seo cur síos ar na rialacha a bhaineann le pinsin phearsanta a eagraíonn daoine atá féin-fhostaithe nó fostaithe nach bhfuil aon scéim phinsin saothair acu
Ireland's Ombudsman for Pensions has the power to investigate and determine complaints concerning disputes of fact, law and errors in relation to occupational and other pension schemes

Beidh an chumhacht ag an Ombudsman na bPinsean fiosrúchán a dhéanamh agus cinneadh a thógáil maidir le do ghearáin a bhaineann le easaontas fíricí nó dlí agus botúin a bhaineann le scéimeanna pinsin saothair agus scéimeanna pinsin eile
Personal Retirement Savings Accounts
Cuntais Phearsanta Coigiltis Scoir
A Personal Retirement Savings Account (PRSA) is long-term personal retirement account designed to enable you to save for retirement in a flexible manner. Find out more about the rules governing PRSAs

Cuntas fadtéarmach pearsanta scoir é Cuntas Pearsanta Coigiltis Scoir (CPCS) atá curtha ar fáil le deis a thabhairt duit airgead a chur ar leataobh don am a bheidh tú imithe ó do phost ar bhealach atá solúbtha
A comprehensive explanation of how pensions are taxed in Ireland
Tá cur síos anseo ar an gcóras le cáin a ghearradh ar phinsin agus ar íocaíochtaí eile leasa shóisialaigh
How pensions are assessed during a separation/divorce/dissolution
Conas a mheasúnaítear pinsin le linn idirscartha/colscartha/scaoilte
Courts in Ireland have the power to treat pensions as assets
Cur síos ar phinsin mar mhaoin agus orduithe ceartú pinsin
This document is in: Family and Relationships > Separation, divorce and dissolution
This document is in: Teaghlach agus Caidrimh > Scaradh, colscaradh agus díscaoileadh
The Pensions Authority (formerly known as the Pensions Board) is the regulatory body for Occupational Pension Schemes and Personal Retirement Savings Accounts (PRSAs)
Is é an tÚdarás Pinsean comhlacht rialála na hÉireann do Scéimeanna Pinsean Ceirde agus Chuntais Choigiltis Scoir Pearsanta (CCSPanna)

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Airgead agus Cáin"

An córas le cáin a mheas
Universal Social Charge (USC)
Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch (MSU)
Introduction to income tax credits and reliefs
